name: Old Roblox 2005 Remastered
description:
This is a remake of Roblox made in a few Minutes by me myself with out using anything.

I couldn't make some of the games because is was too blurry to see.

To get ray-tracing you need to make a shortcut "-DX12"

This requires an Nvidia GeForce RTX 2060 or better and Windows 10 64 Bit 1903 for ray tracing mode on but to turn off ray tracing mode "-dx11" or "-sm5".
